impossible perhaps you don't do

this is BLT business lifestyle
technology for people just like me who
are sandwiched between work and family
these days were judged on a daily basis
by men by women and now thanks to social
media we feel that our lives have to be
picture-perfect a report by the United
Nations shows that 87% of women feel
that they are more harshly judged than
men the motherlode is a website and
social media group of like-minded women
who are brave enough to say it's ok if
you don't live up to those impossible
expectations Kate Dyson is the founder
and CEO of the mother lode ok how did
you setup mother lode well firstly I
have PMD and but when I was in quite a
low place I opened Facebook and I
created a group with just eight friends
originally and that grew and grew and
grew because what I always wanted the
mother lode to be was a very honest
place a place where you could be very
candid about how you felt and about
motherhood and about being a woman
importantly as well we all get it wrong
from time to time and I think
importantly that we learn from getting
it wrong and we can learn from each
other's advice
and where do you think we are judged the
most which areas of our life are under
scrutiny I think there are three areas
we are judged as women in general how we
look how we present ourselves we are
judged as mothers especially and we're
often judged at work I think we're
always trying to achieve and show that
we are the best employee
and I think there's an element of fear
in admitting that you're not getting
it's a hundred percent right all the
time but actually being honest about it
it's the best thing that you can do
because it makes you human and it
reminds people to treat you as a human
rather than just another person in the
workplace what can we do to try and
ignore that if it's on social media and
it's coming from that source shut it
down you know it's in your computer and
you can close it and put it away when
it's at work it's very difficult it's a
harder balance perhaps if you're
starting to feel that you're being
judged but talk to your employer or and
make that connection with people in
order to say you know I'm not feeling
great at the moment and I need your
support when it comes to motherhood I
think it's slightly different because
that judgment just comes from every
direction whether it's health
professionals our own parents sometimes
our friends you can only do your best
and as long as you do your best and you
are true to yourself
who cares what other whatever else
thinks
in terms of doing things for yourself
there are leis of mindfulness apps out
there there are things that you can do
to relax and to just reconsider and

on a post-it note you know like I am a
good person or I have got this or you
know just those little pep talks that
you can do for yourself that just
reminds you that actually I'm fine right
you know I'm doing pretty well when I
change is a life coach one of the most
important tools that you can use is the
life will and you can use it for various
different things and it will help you
gain perspective on how you spend most
of your time start off with a big will
big circle and then think about the
things that you worry about do you worry
about how you look so much how other
people view you or how they judge you do
you worry about your job do you worry
about your children or being a good
parent and do you worry about your
future when you look at the will you'll
be able to see how much of your energy
you spend worrying about certain things
and then you'll be able to make a
decision on how you can go about
changing that
